periods.name: Today
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers before noon, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 50 in the afternoon. North wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.
